title: Draft June Newsletter
description: Write and format the June email newsletter, including the summer promotion section and upcoming webinars.

title: Social Media Calendar Planning
description: Plan and schedule all social media content for July, aligning with product launch dates and holidays.

title: SEO Audit Review
description: Analyze the SEO audit report and prioritize fixes for meta descriptions, broken links, and page load speed.

title: Google Ads Performance Report
description: Pull performance data from Google Ads, calculate ROAS, and summarize results in a slide deck.

title: Coordinate Influencer Campaign
description: Reach out to lifestyle influencers for the July campaign, negotiate deliverables and track content deadlines.

title: Update Brand Guidelines
description: Review and refresh the brand guideline PDF to include new logo rules and updated typography.

title: Customer Testimonial Outreach
description: Identify satisfied customers and reach out for testimonials to feature in next quarter's campaigns.

title: Analytics Dashboard Review
description: Check GA4 dashboard for any anomalies in bounce rates and time-on-page for core web pages.

title: Webinar Promotion Plan
description: Develop a cross-channel strategy to promote next monthâ€™s live webinar to boost attendance.

title: Write Blog Post on AI Trends
description: Research and draft a 1200-word blog post on current AI trends in digital marketing.

title: Product Launch Checklist
description: Create a launch plan checklist for the new product including email, blog, ads, and sales enablement.

title: Run A/B Test on CTA Buttons
description: Set up A/B test for different CTA button texts on the pricing page to improve conversions.

title: Revamp Landing Page Copy
description: Collaborate with the UX team to revise and enhance the landing page copy for our flagship product, ensuring consistency with the latest brand voice. Focus on improving clarity, keyword inclusion for SEO, and adjusting tone based on audience research insights.

title: Competitor Benchmarking Report
description: Conduct a thorough competitor analysis on digital presence, advertising channels, and social engagement metrics. Create a comparative slide deck that includes SWOT analysis, visual asset quality evaluation, and campaign theme summaries for at least 5 direct competitors.

title: Email Drip Campaign Setup
description: Design and implement a new 6-email drip campaign targeting trial users. Messages should progressively introduce product features, include customer success stories, and drive users toward conversion. Coordinate with the design and automation teams to ensure timely deployment.

title: Onboarding Flow Feedback Review
description: Review qualitative feedback collected from recent user testing of the new onboarding flow. Summarize patterns in user confusion points, identify unclear copy or UI elements, and propose actionable updates to reduce drop-off in the first 3 screens.

title: Monthly Marketing Metrics Analysis
description: Aggregate data from GA4, HubSpot, and LinkedIn Campaign Manager to assess performance of all active channels. Write a report that includes channel-specific ROIs, audience segmentation insights, and recommendations for underperforming sources with suggested reallocation of budget.
